doc.field: Record Group 15. (RESTRICTED) Audiovisual (1950s-2008, undated; 26.42 linear feet)
Record Group 15. (RESTRICTED) Audiovisual (1950s-2008, undated; 26.42 linear feet)

This series contains video cassettesâ€”nearly all in VHS format, with some examples of Sony U-matic, Sony V-30H, Sony Beta II, and Sony Betacamp SP. The majority of content relates to special events and student performances, such as recitals, assemblies, and dance and drama performances. Content is identified based on titles written (usually by hand) on cassettes. Several video cases also include ephemera from related performances or events.
